basicInfo.title: Macluumaadka Aasaasiga ah
basicInfo.description: Noo sheeg faahfaahinta aasaasiga ah ee hantidaada

guestAccess.title: Gelitaanka Martida
guestAccess.description: Dooro sida martidu u geli doonto hantidaada

location.title: Faahfaahinta Goobta
location.description: Siiso goobta saxda ah ee hantidaada

details.title: La wadaag waxyaabaha aasaasiga ah ee meeshaada
details.description: Had iyo jeer waxaad bedeli kartaa kuwan markale
details.tipContent: Faahfaahin sax ah ayaa ka caawiya martida inay ogaadaan waxa ay filayaan

intro.title: Ku soo dhawoow Martigalinta!
intro.description: Bilow safarkaaga martigale ahaan. Waxaan kugu hagayn doonaa tillaabooyinka liisaynta hantidaada.
intro.benefit3: Ku raaxeyso buukinad ammaan ah oo la ilaaliyay
intro.infoText: Waxaad bixin doontaa faahfaahin ku saabsan hantidaada, deji doorashadaada, dabna daabac liisaskaaga. Wax walba waxaad wax ka bedeli kartaa markale!

verification.title: Xaqiiji Akoonkaaga
verification.subtitle: Dhammeeyee xaqiijinta si loo hubiyo ammaanka iyo kalsoonida martida

agreement.title: Aqbal Shuruudaha & Siyaasadaha
agreement.subtitle: Dib u eeg oo aqbal shuruudaheenna adeegga iyo siyaasadaha

preferences.title: Doorashada Martigalaha
preferences.subtitle: Deji waqtiga jawaabkaaga iyo doorashada buukinta

profile.title: Dhammeeyee Astaamtaada
profile.subtitle: U sheeg martida naftaada iyo waxa kaga dhigaya martigale fiican

review.title: Dib u eeg & Daabac
review.description: Eeg mar u dambeysa ka hor intaadan daabicin liisaskaaga
review.updateMessage: Liisaska hantidaada waxaa lagu cusboonaysiin doonaa macluumaadka cusub.
review.publishMessage: Hantidaada waa la dib u eegi doonaa lana daabici doonaa 24 saac gudahood. Faahfaahintaan waxaad wax ka bedeli kartaa waqti kasta kadib daabacaadda.
review.draft: Hantidaadu waxaa loo kaydiyay qoraal ahaan
review.publishedMessage: Hantidaadu hadda waa nool tahay waana u muuqataa martida. Waxaad wax ka bedeli kartaa waqti kasta dashboard-kaaga.
review.draftMessage: Hantidaadu waxaa loo kaydiyay qoraal ahaan. Waxaad sii wadi kartaa wax ka bedelka markale.

success.publishedMessage: Hantidaadu si guul leh ayaa loo daabacay waana u muuqataa martida.
success.draftMessage: Hantidaadu waxaa loo kaydiyay qoraal ahaan. Waxaad sii wadi kartaa wax ka bedelka markale.

title.title: Sii hantidaada cinwaan
title.description: Soo jiito martida cinwaan soo jiitaya
title.label: Cinwaanka
title.placeholder: tusaale ahaan, Apartament kulul oo magaala dhexdeeda ah
title.tipContent: Cinwaan fiican ayaa ka caawiya martida inay helaan oo ay xusuustaan hantidaada. Isticmaal erayo qeexaya, la xusuusto oo ka hooseeya 32 xaraf.

tags.title: Dooro calaamado qeexa meeshaada
tags.description: Ka caawo martida inay helaan hantidaada

images.title: Sawirrada Hantida
images.description: Ku dar sawirro tayo sare ah si aad u muujiso hantidaada
images.tipContent: Sawirro tayo sare ah ayaa ka caawiya martida inay si fiican u ogaadaan hantidaada una kordhiyaan buukinada. Isticmaal iftiinka dabiiciga ah oo muuji sifaadkaaga ugu fiican.

description.title: Qeex hantidaada
description.description: U sheeg martida hantidaada iyo waxa kaga dhigaya mid gaar ah
description.label: Sharaxaadda
description.placeholder: Qeex hantidaada, waxa kaga dhigaya mid gaar ah, soojiidashada u dhow, iyo waxa martidu filayaan inta ay joogaan...
description.tipContent: Noqo mid qeexa oo run sheega. Ku sheeg sifaadka gaarka ah, soojiidashada u dhow, iyo faahfaahin muhiim ah oo martidu ogaan lahaayeen.

pricing.title: Deji qiimaha {{type}}
pricing.description: Qiimo tartan leh si aad u soo jiidato buukino badan
pricing.lowPriceWarning: Ka fakir dejinta qiimo sare si aad u hubiso marti tayo leh
pricing.tip: ðŸ’¡ Talo: Baadh hantiyada kula mid ah aagaaga si aad u dejiso qiimo tartan leh

discounts.title: Bixi dhimis si aad u soo jiidato martida
discounts.description: Ikhtiyaari ah: Kordhi buukinada dhimis xeeldheer ah

policies.title: Deji Siyaasadaha Caadiga ah
policies.description: Qaabeey siyaasaddaada joojinta iyo sharciga guriga

hostInfo.title: Noo sheeg naftaada
hostInfo.description: Miyaad liisaysaa qof gaar ah mise ganacsi ahaan?

safetyDisclosures.title: Shaaca ka qaadista ammaanka
safetyDisclosures.weaponsOnProperty: Miyey jiraan hub kasta oo hantida ku yaal?
safetyDisclosures.securityCameras: Miyey jiraan kamirooyinka ammaanka oo hantida ku yaal?

infoBox.title: Ammaanka & Shareecada
infoBox.content: Daahfurnaan ku saabsan sifaadka ammaanka iyo khatarada suurtogalka ah ayaa ka caawiya dhisida kalsoonida martida lana hubinaya ku dhaqanka qawaaniinta maxalliga ah.

draftSelection.savedProperties: Waxaad leedahay hantiyad la kaydiyay oo socda. Mid dooro si aad u sii waddo ama si cusub u billow.
draftSelection.lastEdited: Markii u dambaysay ee la wax ka bedelay {{time}}
